text: Plagiogyria assurgens is a species of fern in the family Plagiogyriaceae. It is endemic (unique) to China.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Plagiogyria assurgens. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.2. www.iucnredlist.org. Downloaded on 01 September 2015. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Cyatheales Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Plagiogyria assurgens
